#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Who Uses Libarchive? =

 * libarchive was originally developed for [http://freebsd.org/ FreeBSD]
 * bsdtar is the default system tar on FreeBSD
 * bsdcpio will be the default system cpio on FreeBSD
 * Kai Wang has built a drop-in "ar" on libarchive
 * Nautilus file browser uses libarchive
 * Several FUSE filesystems are based on libarchive
 * [http://www.archlinux.org/pacman/ Pacman] package manager on Arch Linux uses libarchive
